text: hello and welcome to AWS cost
optimization Series in this episode we
will learn about cloudfront security
savings bundle
so at AWS we give you many opportunities
to receive discounts based on upfront
commitments so Amazon cloudfront is one
of those services that offers you that
option via what is called the cloudfront
security savings bundle and this is a
very simple way that you can use to save
up to 30 percent on your cloudfront
usage while also getting credits to use
AWS web this is our web application
firewall service that you can use to
guard against bots or common web
exploits such as single injections and
cross-site scripting now it's very
simple to get started all you need to do
is commit to a consistent amount that
you're going to pay per month towards
cloudfront for a period of a year so
let's see how this works
so here we have um we're going to
imagine that we have a typical
cloudfront usage of 600 per month
and then what we're going to do is make
a commitment we are going to pay
420 per month for a period of a year
towards cloudfront this is our
commitment now what happens is that
every month AWS went credit to your AWS
account in the value of the 420 plus up
to 30 percent more so in this case six
hundred dollars which if you do the math
is 30 percent more than 420 so that
means you got 600 to spend towards
cloudfront for that month which matches
exactly to our typical usage of cloud
fronts so we have managed to cost
optimize our classroom usage by doing uh
this very simple commitment now on top
of that we actually get credits to use
towards AWS WAFF and that is 10 of the
amount that we have committed ourselves
to pay per month for cloudfront in this
case 42 dollars
so in the end what you end up with is an
estimated yearly Savings of
2664 dollars for this setup so
significant savings by uh doing
something very simple such as using
cloudfront security savings bundle I
hope you have learned something new
today keep on learning and keep on
building on AWS
